title: Material Weather Watch Face
summary: Colored Weather Watch Face that adds a richness to your wear.
developerAddress: Office #2, 2nd Floor, 37-A, Civic Centre, Bahria Town, Islamabad
description: This Watch face is said to have inspired the Utility collection of which the weather is part, and while it has luxurious design. This watch face is secured with a slim line color combination that adds a richness.FrillRoid Watch Faces focus is in creating professional looking watch faces. Each Watch Face is engineered by high quality design and took enormous time to choose the watch colors with soothing effect which ultimately makes the watch unmatchable and incomparable. Key custom features:-• Latest Weather updates• Classic Design• Ultimate readability • Clean and simplistic look • Remaining battery life of your device so you exactly know when to charge• Ambient mode engineered with the latest wear Api makes your watch’s battery stronger than everThis watch face is for rectangular and circular smart watches such as the LG G Watch, LG G Watch R, Samsung Gear Live, Motorola Moto 360, LG G Watch, LG G WATCH R, and Samsung Gear LiveVisit our exclusive Watch face collection for Android Wear on our website www.frillroid.com.How it works?Its simple just download the app to your smartphone and sync it with the watch. The watch face that you will choose will be displayed on your watch screen. Open Settings from Android Wear app to customize the Watch Face. Get this app now and provide us your feedback :)
descriptionHTML:
This Watch face is said to have inspired the Utility collection of which the weather is part, and while it has luxurious design. This watch face is secured with a slim line color combination that adds a richness.

FrillRoid Watch Faces focus is in creating professional looking watch faces. Each Watch Face is engineered by high quality design and took enormous time to choose the watch colors with soothing effect which ultimately makes the watch unmatchable and incomparable.

Key custom features:-
• Latest Weather updates
• Classic Design
• Ultimate readability
• Clean and simplistic look
• Remaining battery life of your device so you exactly know when to charge
• Ambient mode engineered with the latest wear Api makes your watch’s battery stronger than ever

This watch face is for rectangular and circular smart watches such as the LG G Watch, LG G Watch R, Samsung Gear Live, Motorola Moto 360, LG G Watch, LG G WATCH R, and Samsung Gear Live
Visit our exclusive Watch face collection for Android Wear on our website www.frillroid.com.
How it works?
Its simple just download the app to your smartphone and sync it with the watch. The watch face that you will choose will be displayed on your watch screen. Open Settings from Android Wear app to customize the Watch Face. Get this app now and provide us your feedback :)
comments: Lovely designed watch face. Beautiful on Smartwatch 3, wish I could change from km/h to mph though. For those complaining about it wanting you to purchase again, have you selected this face and not the free version? Worked fine for me.
Not working on moto 360 Will revise after its fixed. Even though I paid for the full version, it did not unlock the promised features. It acts like it's not installed.
Can't change anything.. I just bought it, but are still not able to change anything. It just tells me to buy it again.
Premium features not working Even after paying for the premium edition the additional features do not work on my rooted Gear 2 with android wear ROM.  Disappointed.
Accountant Bought this app ; dosen't work ; says buy again. Don't google apps work anymore.
Bought app and doesnt work ask to buy again WTF!
